participant_1.name: Laura
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, she often considers her own past experiences while supporting others.
participant_1.background: I am raising my kids on my own. I am a psychology major. I am too short to reach the top shelf. I am angry at my coworker. My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and friendly, he has a strong bond with family and enjoys nature.
participant_2.background: I love that feeling when you get a new pair of shoes and can't wait to wear them. I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother. My weekends are filled with bird watching. OCD rules my life, and I have a hard time relinquishing control. I live close to the coast.

content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
My day is going great, thanks for asking! I spent the morning bird watching.
I wish I had spent my day bird watching. I would much rather do that than work!
I have always loved birds. My brother and I would go bird watching together when we were kids.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I never had a sibling to do stuff like that with.
I am really close with my brother. He is my best friend.
I'm jealous. My parents got divorced when I was 10 and I lost contact with my brother.
That is so sad. I am sorry to hear that.
Thanks. It was a tough time. But I have my kids now and they are my whole world.
I am sure they are. Kids are great. I want to have kids someday.
You should! They are the best thing in the world.
I know, I know. I just have to find the right person to have them with.
Well, I am sure you will find the right person. Just keep your eyes open.
Thanks for the encouragement. I will!
